attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please do not change our National Anthem.  It is part of our national heritage and should remain as it is.  No other countries hav changed their anthems to take visiting or resident UK people into account.  Leave our heritage alone. 

If we allow this to happen, where will it stop?  Will we have to learn to sing it in 14 different languages?

rejection.details: This petition is based on the premise that there will be a change to the national anthem, which is unubstantiated.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
